description:
Snapshot related operations fail when using CoW images with some xml.etree versions.

Changing differencing vhd/x images parent path fails because of a wrong XML item check. This causes merging vhd/x images to fail as well.

Trace:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/162640/
title: Hyper-V: instance snapshot fails

comments.content:
Snapshot related operations fail when using CoW images with some xml.etree versions.

Changing differencing vhd/x images parent path fails because of a wrong XML item check. This causes merging vhd/x images to fail as well.

Trace:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/162640/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~petrutlucian94

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/150346
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/150346
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=8058ac9ac199355ae5d0d3c19860995f329c1aa5
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 8058ac9ac199355ae5d0d3c19860995f329c1aa5
Author: Lucian Petrut <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jan 26 19:16:58 2015 +0200

    Fixes Hyper-V instance snapshot
    
    Changing differencing vhd/x images parent path fails because of a
    wrong XML item check. This causes merging vhd/x images to fail
    as well.
    
    This bug was introduced by this patch:
    I18b6a1adf398a5fc8f75d0f6276f6896846dbf3a
    
    The issue is that XML elements with no subelements will test as
    False.
    
    This patch solves the bug by properly handling the vhd info XML.
    
    Change-Id: I131802ddf801eaa9bd69815cce3a43fa44e413de
    Closes-bug: #1414965
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
